title: Romulan Negotiations
author: User Example
description: Navigate delicate negotiations with the Romulan Empire to secure a peace treaty.

start.title: Bridge - USS Endeavour
text: Captain's Log, Stardate 48732.4. The USS Endeavour has been dispatched to the neutral zone to meet with a Romulan delegation. After years of tension, the Romulans have expressed interest in establishing a formal peace treaty with the Federation.
As you finish your log entry, your first officer, Commander Voss, approaches your chair.
"Captain, we're approaching the rendezvous coordinates. Long-range sensors have detected a Romulan Warbird decloaking ahead."

choices.text: "Yellow alert. Shields at standby. Let's proceed with caution."
"Open a channel to the Romulan vessel."
"Scan the Warbird for any signs of weapons being powered up."

yellow-alert.title: Bridge - Yellow Alert
text: "Yellow alert. Shields on standby," you order.
The alert panels around the bridge illuminate with a yellow glow as the crew moves to a heightened state of readiness.
"The Romulan vessel is hailing us, Captain," reports your communications officer.

choices.text: "On screen. Let's see what they have to say."
"Scan them first. I want to know their tactical status before we talk."

hail-romulans.title: Bridge - Opening Communications
text: The viewscreen flickers to life, revealing the bridge of the Romulan Warbird. A stern-faced Romulan commander sits in the center chair, flanked by officers at various stations.
"I am Commander Tomalak of the Imperial Warbird Decius. We've been expecting you, Captain. The delegation is prepared to beam aboard your vessel at your convenience."
There's something in his tone that doesn't quite match his words - a hint of reservation, perhaps.

choices.text: "We're honored to host the delegation, Commander. We'll prepare our transporter room immediately."
"Before we proceed, Commander, I'd like to establish some ground rules for these negotiations."
"Commander, I sense some hesitation. Are there concerns you'd like to address before we begin?"

scan-warbird.title: Bridge - Tactical Scan
text: Your tactical officer works at their console, analyzing the incoming sensor data.

"Captain, the Warbird's weapons are powered down, but their shields are at minimum strength - standard procedure for diplomatic meetings. I'm detecting approximately 15 life signs preparing to transport. That's larger than the delegation we were expecting."
Your first officer frowns. "That's almost twice the number we agreed upon. Could be security personnel, or..."
He doesn't finish the sentence, but his implication is clear.

choices.text: "Open a channel. We need to address this discrepancy."
"Proceed as planned, but increase security in the transporter room and conference areas."
